name: Iga Oliwiak
bio: Iga Oliwiak (born 1986 in Szczecin) â€“ artist, painter, drafter, graphic designer, illustrator and photographer. Graduate of the Academy of Art in Szczecin and postgraduate studies at University of Arts London. Lives and works nomadically, documenting the world through drawing, painting and photography. Collaborated on projects such as "Loving Vincent" (Oscar-nominated animated film), "Magic: The Gathering" (worldwide bestselling card game) and with international brands (Uber, Samsung, Deutsche Telekom). Her works have been presented at London Design Festival and in art salons and galleries (e.g. Tate Modern, V&A Museum).
